General.Name: Smartfren Telecom Tbk
General.Description: PT Smartfren Telecom Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication services to individuals and businesses in Indonesia. It installs, constructs, maintains, repairs, and operates telecommunication network and services; trades telecommunication goods, equipment, and/or products, and computer hardware and other equipment; operates website; and offers payment services and implementation of payment system infrastructure. The company also offers 4G LTE internet, VoLTE, IoT technologies, conferencing, and Cloudtalk services. It serves financial services, manufacturing, hospitality, retail, property, transportation, education, and media industries. The company was formerly known as PT Mobile-8 Telecom Tbk and changed its name to PT Smartfren Telecom Tbk in March 2011. PT Smartfren Telecom Tbk was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. K.H. Agus Salim 45, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10340
